Title: Relates to requiring police accident reports to indicate whether the use of a mobile phone contributed to such vehicle accident
Summary: Requires police accident reports to indicate whether a mobile phone was in use at the time of such vehicle accident.
LawCode: Amd ยง603, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring accident reports to indicate whether a mobile phone was in use at the time of the accident
